fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use the ability of any Band member's role.
- (Rehearsal) Select two targets, use the first target's ability on the second, then rehearse.
- (Concert) Use any Band role's ability, whether it is normal, Rehearsal, or Concert.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**- Rehearsal Radius: 4**
- Your normal ability can only target Band roles that exist in the game, alive or dead.
- If you are a solo Band member to begin with, 2 random Band roles will be available at your disposal at the beginning of the day for your normal ability.
- Control and redirect immune.
